issue.title: www.facebook.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com) ### Comment > Numerous facebook ads are getting by AdGuard for Safari ON IPHONE. This never used to happen. I have all filters, etc. enabled. On Mac desktop, no facebook ads get past AdGuard. Issue is only on iPhone Safari. ### Screenshots
